name: trivial_fetch_from_url
title: Fetch from URL
description: Fetch a file from a URL and upload it as a file.

inputSpec.name: additional_types
inputSpec.label: Additional Types
inputSpec.help: A comma-separated list of additional types with which to label the imported file (e.g. "dbsnp,database" would label the file as types dbsnp and database)

inputSpec.name: output_name
inputSpec.label: Output Name
inputSpec.help: Name to give the downloaded file
